column5: AXDX Jack is back Shrinking that float
Major owner of Accelerate Diagnostics Inc just picked up 19300 shares conferencecalltranscriptso AXDX
AXDX filed SEC form 4 Director SCHULER JACK W Bought 19300 of Common Stock at price 1902 on 20190521 secgovArchivesedgardata

AXDX TTOO highroller Im always on edge with this type of investment But ask yourself who knows more about these companies than the people in charge and own millions of sharers or is it often times the foolish emotional stock twitters myself included Jack Shuler AXDX largest shareholder continues to buy the stock over over 50k shares on TuesdayWhere are TTOO largest shareholders at and what are they doing Maybe they are buying Im askingWhy does AXDX have the valuation it does Look at many of the posts on the TTOO board and ask yourself if they seem rationale and logical I hate to lose and dont like to see others as well Its hard to take losses and to change ones mind AXDX may also turn out to be a bad investment but the choice between the 2 companies should be clear by now Crystal clear If a short attack happens on AXDX as it has before there will be many there to defend for good reason Good luck Not trolling just giving opinion
TTOO I have long favored AXDX over T2 Cause axdx does both ID and AST But this SA article is another shameful dishonest hit piece

AXDX yall better be on edge Its a matter of time before the short cronies move over here with their inaccurate articles Even though I favor ttoo shorting either of these companies at this point is beyond dangerous
